title: Aromatherapy Oil Blend - Meditation
description: A blend of organic essential oils to help focus the mind and assist you find peace. Mandarin & Ylang Ylang. Vetiver root oil, sweet almond oil, wheatgerm oil, ylang ylang oil. for use in a bath or as a massage oil 100 ml
